- zoom: '12'
  lat: '-5.8310'
  lng: '105.2030'
  fromTime: '2019-03-21T00:00:00.000Z'
  toTime: '2019-03-21T23:59:59.999Z'
  datasetId: S1_AWS_IW_VVVH
  platform:
  - CDSE
  - EOB
  evalscripturl: https://custom-scripts.sentinel-hub.com/custom-scripts/sentinel-1/sar_false_color_visualization/script.js
---

## Description
The script visualizes Earth surface in False Color from Sentinel-1 data.  
It helps in maritime monitoring (ice monitoring, ship monitoring,...) land monitoring (agricolture, deforestation,...) and emergency management (flood monitoring, volcano monitoring, ...).

## Contributors:

 - [Annamaria Luongo](https://twitter.com/annamaria_84){:target="_blank"} 
 
## Examples non-ehanced:
### Veira glacier 
 - [Veira glacier, 2017](https://apps.sentinel-hub.com/eo-browser/?lat=-49.4601&lng=-73.1207&zoom=12&time=2017-03-20&preset=CUSTOM&datasource=Sentinel-1%20AWS%20(S1-AWS-IW-VVVH)&layers=VV,VH,HH&%3D){:target="_blank"}

![Veira 2017](fig/veira1.png)

 - [Veira glacier, 2019](https://apps.sentinel-hub.com/eo-browser/?lat=-49.4601&lng=-73.1207&zoom=12&time=2019-03-15&preset=CUSTOM&datasource=Sentinel-1%20AWS%20(S1-AWS-IW-VVVH)&layers=VV,VH,HH&%3D){:target="_blank"}   

![Veira 2019](fig/veira2.png)

### Anak Krakatau 
 - [EO Browser](https://apps.sentinel-hub.com/eo-browser/?lat=-6.11086&lng=105.41905&zoom=13&time=2018-12-31&preset=CUSTOM&datasource=Sentinel-1%20AWS%20(S1-AWS-IW-VVVH)&layers=VV,VH,HH&%3D){:target="_blank"}

![Krakatau](fig/Krakatau.png)

## Examples enhanced:
###  Gange delta

![Gange march](fig/gange1.png)

 - [Gange delta in July](https://apps.sentinel-hub.com/eo-browser/?lat=22.0615&lng=89.2014&zoom=10&time=2018-07-26&preset=CUSTOM&datasource=Sentinel-1%20AWS%20(S1-AWS-IW-VVVH)&layers=VV,VH,HH&%3D){:target="_blank"}

![Gange march](fig/gange2.png)

### Po delta and Padana Plain   
 - [Po delta and Padana Plain in March](https://apps.sentinel-hub.com/eo-browser/?lat=44.9522&lng=11.9459&zoom=11&time=2019-03-26&preset=CUSTOM&datasource=Sentinel-1%20AWS%20(S1-AWS-IW-VVVH)&layers=VV,VH,HH&%3D){:target="_blank"}
